abstract: Setting the stage for a possible proxy battle, Carl C. Icahn said Wednesday that talks between himself and Lions Gate Entertainment, aimed at giving the billionaire investor board representation, have broken down.
lead_paragraph: Setting the stage for a possible proxy battle, Carl C. Icahn said Wednesday that talks between himself and Lions Gate Entertainment, aimed at giving the billionaire investor board representation, have broken down.

headline.main: Icahn Says Talks With Lions Gate Broke Down
